item.title: Supercharge your Logseq workflow
item.description: Logseq Overview Plugins habit tracker Bookmarklets Tab manger Todo Status Master Highlighting H1 Copy Ref to Journal Doc Snippets Adding Tags #+TAGS: @work @home @tennisclub #+TAGS: laptop car pc sailboat ``` Heirarchy with tags * Meeting with the French group :work: ** Summary by Frank :boss:notes: *** TODO Prepare slides for him :action: ``` Videos https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=43PKm0TfyNk Blog Posts https://phonetonote.com/blog/my-personal-note-taking-journey/
